requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A baseball fan visiting the site to check live game updates.
user_goal: To view up-to-date player stats and team information without reloading the page.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees a loading spinner where the latest games should be displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for initial load and API data fetch.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dynamic content such as recent games and team standings appear after data loads from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Player Stats
narrative_steps.description: Curious about a specific player, Sarah clicks on the 'Players' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Players' navigation link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page dynamically updates with a list of players fetched via an API call, no full page reload occurs.

requirement_tested: A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_goal: Verify that the backend successfully retrieves data from the configured PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Sending Request to Backend
narrative_steps.description: The developer sends a GET request to retrieve a list of teams.
narrative_steps.action: Make a GET request to `/api/teams` endpoint.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns a JSON response containing team data retrieved from the PostgreSQL database using correct environment variables.

requirement_tested: Player statistics tracking functionality with detailed views
user_persona: A fantasy baseball manager analyzing player performance.
user_goal: To compare batting averages across multiple seasons for drafting purposes.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Player Profile
narrative_steps.description: Jake navigates to a specific player's profile page to evaluate his stats.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a player detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page displays a comprehensive breakdown of the player’s career statistics.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering by Season
narrative_steps.description: Jake selects different years from a dropdown menu to analyze year-over-year performance.
narrative_steps.action: Select a season from the season filter dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Statistics update automatically to reflect the selected season's data.

requirement_tested: Team management features including roster editing and financial management
user_persona: A team owner managing their virtual baseball club.
user_goal: To adjust the team roster and stay within budget limits.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Team Management Section
narrative_steps.description: Alex logs into his account and goes to the team management dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Manage Team' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a page displaying the current roster and available budget.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Roster
narrative_steps.description: Alex decides to move a player from the bench to the starting lineup by dragging them.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop a player from the bench slot to an active roster position.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The change takes effect immediately and reflects in the updated lineup display.

requirement_tested: Live game simulation engine with real-time result visualization
user_persona: An enthusiast watching a simulated game unfold.
user_goal: To watch a live baseball game simulation with real-time updates.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Simulation
narrative_steps.description: Emma finds a scheduled game and clicks to begin the live simulation.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Start Simulation' button for a selected game.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Game animation begins along with a live score ticker and commentary updates streamed in real time.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Past Plays
narrative_steps.description: Emma scrolls backward through the play history to revisit key moments.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll up through the historical plays timeline.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Previous plays are displayed, pausing the live feed temporarily but resuming once scrolling stops.

requirement_tested: Interactive lineup and strategy adjustment interface for users
user_persona: A strategic gamer optimizing team tactics.
user_goal: To customize batting order before running a simulation.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Lineup Editor
narrative_steps.description: Mike enters the lineup editor to make tactical adjustments ahead of tomorrow’s game.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit Lineup' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid-based interface appears allowing repositioning of players.

narrative_steps.title: Rearranging Players
narrative_steps.description: Mike drags his best hitter to the third spot in the batting order.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop a player to a new batting position.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The lineup updates instantly, ready for use in the next simulation.

requirement_tested: User interface with floral white background and dark goldenrod interactive elements
user_persona: A casual visitor exploring the site aesthetics.
user_goal: To navigate the site comfortably with a pleasant visual theme.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Site Theme
narrative_steps.description: Lisa visits the homepage and notices the soothing background color and highlighted buttons.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page renders with a floral white background and dark goldenrod-colored buttons and links.

requirement_tested: Database schema supporting players, teams, statistics, and game simulations
user_persona: A system administrator verifying database integrity.
user_goal: To ensure all required tables exist and are properly structured.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Table Structure
narrative_steps.description: Admin connects to the PostgreSQL database to inspect schema compliance.
narrative_steps.action: Run SQL query to describe tables like players, teams, and statistics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables exist with appropriate columns and foreign key relationships as per defined schema.

requirement_tested: Authentication and user session management system
user_persona: A registered user logging into their account.
user_goal: To securely access personalized features of the site.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Tom returns to the site and enters his credentials into the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email and password fields, then click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully redirected to the dashboard with a valid JWT cookie set.

requirement_tested: Dashboard for overview of team performance and upcoming games
user_persona: A busy coach checking quick insights.
user_goal: To get a snapshot of team performance and schedule.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Dashboard Summary
narrative_steps.description: Coach Riley logs in and lands directly on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and observe the dashboard landing page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard shows cards summarizing recent wins/losses, upcoming opponents, and top performers.

narrative_steps.title: Drilling Down into Schedule
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by the next game preview, Riley clicks on the card for more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Upcoming Games' widget.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a detailed calendar view listing all upcoming matches.

requirement_tested: Historical game results and statistics archive
user_goal: To find and review specific historical game data.

narrative_steps.title: Searching Archives
narrative_steps.description: Dan visits the archives section to look up last year’s championship game.
narrative_steps.action: Type keywords into the archive search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of matching games appears instantly, narrowing down options effectively.

user_persona: A spectator engaged in a live match simulation.
user_goal: To follow every important moment as it happens.

narrative_steps.title: Watching Live Game
narrative_steps.description: While a game simulates, Chloe receives real-time notifications about big plays.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the game screen during active simulation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Toast-style alerts pop up announcing significant events like home runs or scoring changes.

requirement_tested: Configuration in package.json for `npm run install:all` to install frontend and backend dependencies
user_persona: A new contributor setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To quickly install all dependencies for both frontend and backend.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clones the repository and runs the installation script.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` in terminal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully without errors.

requirement_tested: Configuration in package.json for `npm run dev` to start frontend and backend concurrently
user_persona: A developer beginning work on a feature branch.
user_goal: To launch both development servers efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Dev Servers
narrative_steps.description: Patricia wants to develop and test simultaneously on both sides.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers start concurrently, accessible on their respective ports.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design compatible with desktop and mobile browsers
user_persona: A mobile user browsing during commute.
user_goal: To navigate and interact seamlessly on a small screen.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Mobile View
narrative_steps.description: On her phone, Maria opens the website to check tonight’s game.
narrative_steps.action: Resize window or open site on a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively, stacking elements vertically and preserving usability.
